ca.gc.space.topology.ui
Interface PresentationTopology

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
PresentationTopologyImpl
public interface PresentationTopology
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject

A representation of the model object 'Presentation Topology'.

The following features are supported:

  • Presentation Nodes
  • Scene Transformation
  • Topology
  • Axis Visible
  • Scene Centroid
  • Drag And Drop Mode

See Also:
UiPackage.getPresentationTopology()

getPresentationNodes

org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<NodePresentation> getPresentationNodes()
Returns the value of the 'Presentation Nodes' containment reference list. The list contents are of type NodePresentation.
